sentences.english: Exit from gate 3 of Hechuan station (metro line 9), and walk 4 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 地鐵9號線合川路站3號口出，步行4分鐘。

sentences.english: Hechuan is a regional central major city in chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 合川是重慶規劃建設的區域性中心大城市。
